data: PED NEPH Hemodialysis Acute Treatment (Day of Treatment)
Patient Care
Hemodialysis
Please refer to HD Powerform for most recent HD prescription
Provide SBP goal to notify provider if SBP greater or less than indicated goal
Notify Treating Provider Vital Signs
Blood Pressure requirements
Vital Signs
Respiratory rate, blood pressure and heart rate

For Red Blood Cell priming, order from PED/NEO TM Red Blood (RBC) Cell Transfusion (Module) and discuss with transfusion medicine to dilute red blood cells with normal saline to a final hematocrit of 0.35
5% Albumin for Circuit Priming
Blood Product Fact Sheet 5% Albumin
Administer - Albumin 5% for Priming
Albumin 5%, Route: circuit, Administer each over: Not applicable, Indications: Hemodialysis Priming
Intradialytic Complication Management
PED NEPH AMB Hemodialysis Intradialytic Complication Management (Module)
Continuous Infusion
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) bolus
5 mL/kg, q10min, PRN other (see comment), order duration: 3 doses or times, drug form: bag
Laboratory
Hematology
Reticulocytes
Blood, STAT, Unit collect, Collection: T;N, once, Collect pre-HD
